channel.title: The Middle East War
channel.description:
A series of five 10-minute analyses of the Six-Day War by British Broadcasting Corporation Middle East correspondent James Thompson.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Analysis, part three
item.description: This program presents the third part of an analysis of the Six-Day War.
item.dc:creator: British Broadcasting Corporation
item.dc:subject: Israel-Arab War, 1967
